description: The classic story of the Little Red Hen translated into the Cherokee Language. Dual language Cherokee and English. ᎧᏃᎮᏗ Ꮎ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎠᎩᎦᎨ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎠᎩᏏ. ᏔᎵ ᏗᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎠᎴ ᎩᎵᏏ.
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Ꮎ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎠᎩᎦᎨ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎠᎩᏏ - ᏔᎵ ᏗᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎠᎴ ᎩᎵᏏ - The Little Red Hen - Dual Language Cherokee and English
